name: Untitled Sheep Game
description:
Hollow Knight + Metal Slug + Sheep Girl =  this game.  Made in two weeks in Unity, thus it has limited features. Windows only.

Financial assistance is very welcomed. The money will be used to make more games.

https://www.patreon.com/intfarm

Controls:

Mouse to aim, left mouse to shoot. AD for left/right movement and S for crouch. Space to jump. Esc to pause.
